In several places, several anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste)
In several places, some anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).
In some places, several anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).
In some places, some anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).
"every resources on floors, tables and other open space are used properly (no excess, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste). There may be insignificant irregularities."
In several places, several anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste)
In several places, some anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).
In some places, several anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).
In some places, some anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).

"Every resources in closets, drawers and other enclosed spaces are shared and used correctly (no excess, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste). There may be insignificant irregularities.
There are widespread conservation problems and some compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics.
There are conservation problems in some facilities or resource. some compromises the safety or functionality, according to environmental characteristics.
There are widespread conservation problems but not compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics.
There are conservation problems in some facilities or resource but not compromises the safety or functionality, according to environmental characteristics.
All facilities and resources are in good condition. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
There is no formal justification for most conservation problems encountered

There is no formal justification for some conservation problems, including for some that compromises the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics.
There is no formal justification for some conservation problems, but it does not compromises the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics.
There is no formal justification for one conservation problem, but it does not compromis the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics.

There is a formal justification for all conservation problems and none of them compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction of most of the deficiences
In several places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction some of them.
In some places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction some of them.
In some places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is a plan for the correction of them

In all places there are identifications and signage that facilitate the location and avoid the loss of time and risks. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are several resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.).
In several places there are some resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.).
In some places there are several resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.).
In some places there are some resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.).
There are defined and suitable places for all the resources used (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.

In several places were found several resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems).

In several places were found some resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems).

In some places were found several resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems).
In some places were found some resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems).

All resources are classified and organized (there are no resources available outside of storage places, mixed, difficulty of visual location or risk problems).There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.

In several places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction of the majority.

In several places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction some of them.

In some places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction some of them.

In some places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is a plan for the correction of them

The location of all productive and support resources is appropriate, facilitates movement and / or access, avoiding risks, fatigue and loss of time. It may have insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there is dirt, all caused by the people of the area
In several places there is dirt, some provoked by the people of the area or by non compliance with the cleaning routine.
In some places there is dirt, some provoked by the people of the area or by non compliance with the cleaning routine.
In some places there is dirt clearly provoked by people from other areas or simply by non compliance with the cleaning routine.
There is no dirt caused by people or lack of cleaning routine. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are source of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, generating risks of accidents and that are not contained.
In some places there are source of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, generating risks of accidents and that are not contained.
The sources of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, is not generating risks of accidents. There is no defined deadline for the removal of sources of dirt.
The sources of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, is not generating risks of accidents. There is defined deadline for the removal of sources of dirt.

Sources of dirt (machinery, equipment, handling of product) or dirt accumulated over time do not create a risk of accidents and the extinction of their source was considered technically and financially unviable by the company. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning any type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.).
There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning several type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.).
There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning some type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.).

There is a defined frequency and suitable for cleaning all type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.).The systematic does not include, in writing, all places of difficult access.

There is a defined frequency and suitable for cleaning all type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.). The routine includes, all the places of difficult access.

In several places there are several deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.).

In several places there are some deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.).

In some places there are several deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.).

In some places there are some deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.).

All waste baskets, and other collectors are suitable (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
